Name: Juan Manuel
description:
Juan, 42 years old, is married and has two children. He characterizes himself as being a very responsible and hardworking person, visionary and a good businessman.

He has always worked at his activity of beekeeping in the municipality of Sahagún and for some years has had his own business, where he also distributes these products for sale.

He has been able to overcome difficult times with his sales. It is for this that Juan came to ask for a loan, which he will use to purchase honey to sell since his production is a bit low and to pay laborers to collect the yuca.

In this way, he will have full capacity to stock up and continue offering his products to continue sustaining his productive business.

If you want to know more about the entrepreneurs and the loans from Interactuar, you can join the Lending Team called: “Friends of Interactuar Colombia”: http://www.kiva.org/team/interactuar_colombia"
